item.title: Making great axe and D2H walk normal and not like a g maul
item.dc:creator: @funtwo funtwo
item.description:
@funtwo wrote:

Purpose:to stop u walking like a retard
difficulty: 1
assumed knowledge: c+p
file modified: client.java
credits:100% me

right so this will stop ur character holding a d2h and great axe like a g maul wile walking

Great Axe: 0pen your client.java and search
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) { // Dharok's Greataxe
under that you will have 4 things saying player and then a }
highlight the 4 player things and paste

playerSE = 0x811; playerSEA = 2661; playerSEW = 2064; playerSER = 0x680;

it should now look like this
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) { // Dharok's Greataxe playerSE = 0x811; playerSEA = 2661; playerSEW = 2064; playerSER = 0x680; }

D2H: Search for if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7158) { // Dragon 2h sword
and in the 4 player things jus paste the same thing as u did with great axe.
it should look like this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7158) { // Dragon 2h sword playerSE = 0x811; playerSEA = 2661; playerSEW = 2064; playerSER = 0x680; }

Read full topic
item.source: Making great axe and D2H walk normal and not like a g maul
